scheduler_library¶

Collection of classes and functions related to constructing a radar system scheduler.

scheduler_library.calculate_observation_params(duty_cycle, SST_f, tracking_f, coher_int_t=0.1, IPP=0.01, interleaving_time_slice=0.4, scan_during_interleaved=False)[source]¶
